DKDEPEND(zlib-1.2.8)
DKDEPEND(freetype-2.5.5)
DKDEPEND(libpng-1.7.0beta34)

### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(${DKONLINE}/Libs/podofo-0.9.5.tar.gz podofo-0.9.5)
DKSET(PODOFO ${3RDPARTY}/podofo-0.9.5)


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${PODOFO}/podofo)
WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${PODOFO}/${OS}/Debug/PODOFO.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${PODOFO}/${OS}/Release/PODOFO.lib)
MAC_DEBUG_LIB(${PODOFO}/${OS}/${DEBUG}/libPODOFO.a)
MAC_RELEASE_LIB(${PODOFO}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/libPODOFO.a)
IOSSIM_DEBUG_LIB(${PODOFO}/${OS}/${DEBUG}/libPODOFO.a)
IOSSIM_RELEASE_LIB(${PODOFO}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/libPODOFO.a)
LINUX_DEBUG_LIB(${PODOFO}/${OS}/Debug/libPODOFO.a)
LINUX_RELEASE_LIB(${PODOFO}/${OS}/Release/libPODOFO.a)
ANDROID_DEBUG_LIB(${PODOFO}/${OS}/Debug/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libPODOFO.a)
ANDROID_RELEASE_LIB(${PODOFO}/${OS}/Release/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libPODOFO.a)


### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${PODOFO}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /I${ZLIB}/${OS}" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DPODOFO_BUILD_STATIC=ON -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY_DEBUG=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Debug/zlibstatic.lib -DZLIB_LIBRARY_RELEASE=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release/zlibstatic.lib -DFREETYPE_INCLUDE_DIR_FTHEADER=${FREETYPE}/include -DFREETYPE_INCLUDE_DIR_FT2BUILD=${FREETYPE}/include -DFREETYPE_LIBRARY_DEBUG=${FREETYPE}/${OS}/Debug/freetype.lib -DFREETYPE_LIBRARY_RELEASE=${FREETYPE}/${OS}/Release/freetype.lib -DPNG_LIBRARY_DEBUG=${PNG}/${OS}/Debug/libpng17_staticd.lib -DPNG_LIBRARY_RELEASE=${PNG}/${OS}/Release/libpng17_static.lib ${PODOFO})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(podofo-0.9.5 PoDoFo.sln podofo_static)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(podofo-0.9.5 PoDoFo.sln podofo_static)

DKSETPATH(${PODOFO}/${OS})
WIN64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${X64GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${PODOFO})
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(podofo-0.9.5 PoDoFo.sln podofo_static)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(podofo-0.9.5 PoDoFo.sln podofo_static)

DKSETPATH(${PODOFO}/${OS})
MAC_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=x86_64 ${PODOFO})
MAC_XCODE_DEBUG(podofo-0.9.5 PODOFO)
MAC_XCODE_RELEASE(podofo-0.9.5 PODOFO)

DKSETPATH(${PODOFO}/${OS})
IOS_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=OS ${PODOFO})
IOS_XCODE_DEBUG(podofo-0.9.5 PODOFO)
IOS_XCODE_RELEASE(podofo-0.9.5 PODOFO)

DKSETPATH(${PODOFO}/${OS})
IOSSIM_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=SIMULATOR64 ${PODOFO})
IOSSIM_XCODE_DEBUG(podofo-0.9.5 PODOFO)
IOSSIM_XCODE_RELEASE(podofo-0.9.5 PODOFO)

##DKSETPATH(${PODOFO}/${OS}/${DEBUG})
##IOSSIM_DEBUG_COMMAND(../../configure --enable-static=yes --enable-shared=no --without-bzip2 "CFLAGS=-arch x86_64")
##IOSSIM_DEBUG_COMMAND(make)

##DKSETPATH(${PODOFO}/${OS}/${RELEASE})
##IOSSIM_RELEASE_COMMAND(../../configure --enable-static=yes --enable-shared=no --without-bzip2 "CFLAGS=-arch x86_64")
##IOSSIM_RELEASE_COMMAND(make)


DKSETPATH(${PODOFO}/${OS}/Debug)
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG ${PODOFO})
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(make PODOFO)

DKSETPATH(${PODOFO}/${OS}/Release)
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE ${PODOFO})
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(make PODOFO)

ANDROID_NDK_DEBUG(podofo-0.9.5)
ANDROID_NDK_RELEASE(podofo-0.9.5)
